meanings.definition: Relating to the muscles and skeleton.
meanings.sent1: The musculoskeletal system helps us move our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often study musculoskeletal injuries to understand how to treat them.
meanings.sent3: The musculoskeletal dance routine at the talent show was both impressive and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a musculoskeletal structure, unwavering in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The importance of maintaining a healthy musculoskeletal system cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the structure and function of muscles and bones.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise is crucial for maintaining a strong musculoskeletal system.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often focus on improving their musculoskeletal strength to enhance performance.
meanings.sent3: The musculoskeletal puzzle game was both educational and fun to play.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was as solid as a well-built musculoskeletal framework.
meanings.sent5: The musculoskeletal connection between muscles and bones ensures smooth movement.
